00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FILTER
00042 
00043 #include <dt_object.h>
00044 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00045 #include <lustre_lfsck.h>

00047 #include "ofd_internal.h"
00048 
00063 static int ofd_version_get_check(struct ofd_thread_info *info,
00064                                  struct ofd_object *fo)
00065 {
00066         dt_obj_version_t curr_version;
00067 
00068         LASSERT(ofd_object_exists(fo));
00069 
00070         if (info->fti_exp == NULL)
00071                 RETURN(0);
00072 
00073         curr_version = dt_version_get(info->fti_env, ofd_object_child(fo));
00074         if ((__s64)curr_version == -EOPNOTSUPP)
00075                 RETURN(0);
00076         /* VBR: version is checked always because costs nothing */
00077         if (info->fti_pre_version != 0 &&
00078             info->fti_pre_version != curr_version) {
00079                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Version mismatch "LPX64" != "LPX64"\n",
00080                        info->fti_pre_version, curr_version);
00081                 spin_lock(&info->fti_exp->exp_lock);
00082                 info->fti_exp->exp_vbr_failed = 1;
00083                 spin_unlock(&info->fti_exp->exp_lock);
00084                 RETURN (-EOVERFLOW);
00085         }
00086         info->fti_pre_version = curr_version;
00087         RETURN(0);
00088 }
00089 
00102 struct ofd_object *ofd_object_find(const struct lu_env *env,
00103                                    struct ofd_device *ofd,
00104                                    const struct lu_fid *fid)
00105 {
00106         struct ofd_object *fo;
00107         struct lu_object  *o;
00108 
00109         ENTRY;
00110 
00111         o = lu_object_find(env, &ofd->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev, fid, NULL);
00112         if (likely(!IS_ERR(o)))
00113                 fo = ofd_obj(o);
00114         else
00115                 fo = ERR_CAST(o); /* return error */
00116 
00117         RETURN(fo);
00118 }
00119 
00138 int ofd_object_ff_load(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo)
00139 {
00140         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00141         struct filter_fid_old   *ff   = &info->fti_mds_fid_old;
00142         struct lu_buf           *buf  = &info->fti_buf;
00143         struct lu_fid           *pfid = &fo->ofo_pfid;
00144         int                      rc   = 0;
00145 
00146         if (fid_is_sane(pfid))
00147                 return 0;
00148 
00149         buf->lb_buf = ff;
00150         buf->lb_len = sizeof(*ff);
00151         rc = dt_xattr_get(env, ofd_object_child(fo), buf, XATTR_NAME_FID);
00152         if (rc < 0)
00153                 return rc;
00154 
00155         if (rc < sizeof(struct lu_fid)) {
00156                 fid_zero(pfid);
00157 
00158                 return -ENODATA;
00159         }
00160 
00161         pfid->f_seq = le64_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_seq);
00162         pfid->f_oid = le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_oid);
00163         pfid->f_stripe_idx = le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_stripe_idx);
00164 
00165         return 0;
00166 }
00167 
00174 void ofd_object_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo)
00175 {
00176         lu_object_put(env, &fo->ofo_obj.do_lu);
00177 }

00206 int ofd_precreate_objects(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00207                           u64 id, struct ofd_seq *oseq, int nr, int sync)
00208 {
00209         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00210         struct ofd_object       *fo = NULL;
00211         struct dt_object        *next;
00212         struct thandle          *th;
00213         struct ofd_object       **batch;
00214         struct lu_fid           *fid = &info->fti_fid;
00215         u64                      tmp;
00216         int                      rc;
00217         int                      i;
00218         int                      objects = 0;
00219         int                      nr_saved = nr;
00220 
00221         ENTRY;
00222 
00223         /* Don't create objects beyond the valid range for this SEQ */
00224         if (unlikely(fid_seq_is_mdt0(ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi)) &&
00225                      (id + nr) >= IDIF_MAX_OID)) {
00226                 CERROR("%s:"DOSTID" hit the IDIF_MAX_OID (1<<48)!\n",
00227                        ofd_name(ofd), id, ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi));
00228                 RETURN(rc = -ENOSPC);
00229         } else if (unlikely(!fid_seq_is_mdt0(ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi)) &&
00230                             (id + nr) >= OBIF_MAX_OID)) {
00231                 CERROR("%s:"DOSTID" hit the OBIF_MAX_OID (1<<32)!\n",
00232                        ofd_name(ofd), id, ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi));
00233                 RETURN(rc = -ENOSPC);
00234         }
00235 
00236         OBD_ALLOC(batch, nr_saved * sizeof(struct ofd_object *));
00237         if (batch == NULL)
00238                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00239 
00240         info->fti_attr.la_valid = LA_TYPE | LA_MODE;
00241         info->fti_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG | S_ISUID | S_ISGID | 0666;
00242         info->fti_dof.dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFREG);
00243 
00244         info->fti_attr.la_valid |= LA_ATIME | LA_MTIME | LA_CTIME;
00245         info->fti_attr.la_atime = 0;
00246         info->fti_attr.la_mtime = 0;
00247         info->fti_attr.la_ctime = 0;
00248 
00249         LASSERT(id != 0);
00250 
00251         /* prepare objects */
00252         *fid = *lu_object_fid(&oseq->os_lastid_obj->do_lu);
00253         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++) {
00254                 rc = fid_set_id(fid, id + i);
00255                 if (rc != 0) {
00256                         if (i == 0)
00257                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00258 
00259                         nr = i;
00260                         break;
00261                 }
00262 
00263                 fo = ofd_object_find(env, ofd, fid);
00264                 if (IS_ERR(fo)) {
00265                         if (i == 0)
00266                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
00267 
00268                         nr = i;
00269                         break;
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 ofd_write_lock(env, fo);
00273                 batch[i] = fo;
00274         }
00275         info->fti_buf.lb_buf = &tmp;
00276         info->fti_buf.lb_len = sizeof(tmp);
00277         info->fti_off = 0;
00278 
00279         th = ofd_trans_create(env, ofd);
00280         if (IS_ERR(th))
00281                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00282 
00283         th->th_sync |= sync;
00284 
00285         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj, &info->fti_buf,
00286                                      info->fti_off, th);
00287         if (rc)
00288                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00289 
00290         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++) {
00291                 fo = batch[i];
00292                 LASSERT(fo);
00293 
00294                 if (unlikely(ofd_object_exists(fo))) {
00295                         /* object may exist being re-created by write replay */
00296                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "object "LPX64"/"LPX64" exists: "
00297                                DFID"\n", ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi), id,
00298                                PFID(lu_object_fid(&fo->ofo_obj.do_lu)));
00299                         continue;
00300                 }
00301 
00302                 next = ofd_object_child(fo);
00303                 LASSERT(next != NULL);
00304 
00305                 rc = dt_declare_create(env, next, &info->fti_attr, NULL,
00306                                        &info->fti_dof, th);
00307                 if (rc < 0) {
00308                         if (i == 0)
00309                                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00310 
00311                         nr = i;
00312                         break;
00313                 }
00314         }
00315 
00316         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00317         if (rc)
00318                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00319 
00320         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%s: create new object "DFID" nr %d\n",
00321                ofd_name(ofd), PFID(fid), nr);
00322 
00323          /* When the LFSCK scanning the whole device to verify the LAST_ID file
00324           * consistency, it will load the last_id into RAM firstly, and compare
00325           * the last_id with each OST-object's ID. If the later one is larger,
00326           * then it will regard the LAST_ID file crashed. But during the LFSCK
00327           * scanning, the OFD may continue to create new OST-objects. Those new
00328           * created OST-objects will have larger IDs than the LFSCK known ones.
00329           * So from the LFSCK view, it needs to re-load the last_id from disk
00330           * file, and if the latest last_id is still smaller than the object's
00331           * ID, then the LAST_ID file is real crashed.
00332           *
00333           * To make above mechanism to work, before OFD pre-create OST-objects,
00334           * it needs to update the LAST_ID file firstly, otherwise, the LFSCK
00335           * may cannot get latest last_id although new OST-object created. */
00336         if (!OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_SKIP_LASTID)) {
00337                 tmp = cpu_to_le64(id + nr - 1);
00338                 dt_write_lock(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj, 0);
00339                 rc = dt_record_write(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj,
00340                                      &info->fti_buf, &info->fti_off, th);
00341                 dt_write_unlock(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj);
00342                 if (rc != 0)
00343                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00344         }
00345 
00346         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++) {
00347                 fo = batch[i];
00348                 LASSERT(fo);
00349 
00350                 /* Only the new created objects need to be recorded. */
00351                 if (ofd->ofd_osd->dd_record_fid_accessed) {
00352                         struct lfsck_request *lr = &ofd_info(env)->fti_lr;
00353 
00354                         lfsck_pack_rfa(lr, lu_object_fid(&fo->ofo_obj.do_lu),
00355                                        LE_FID_ACCESSED,
00356                                        LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT);
00357                         lfsck_in_notify(env, ofd->ofd_osd, lr, NULL);
00358                 }
00359 
00360                 if (likely(!ofd_object_exists(fo) &&
00361                            !OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_DANGLING))) {
00362                         next = ofd_object_child(fo);
00363                         LASSERT(next != NULL);
00364 
00365                         rc = dt_create(env, next, &info->fti_attr, NULL,
00366                                        &info->fti_dof, th);
00367                         if (rc < 0) {
00368                                 if (i == 0)
00369                                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00370 
00371                                 rc = 0;
00372                                 break;
00373                         }
00374                         LASSERT(ofd_object_exists(fo));
00375                 }
00376                 ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, id + i);
00377         }
00378 
00379         objects = i;
00380         /* NOT all the wanted objects have been created,
00381          * set the LAST_ID as the real created. */
00382         if (unlikely(objects < nr)) {
00383                 int rc1;
00384 
00385                 info->fti_off = 0;
00386                 tmp = cpu_to_le64(ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
00387                 dt_write_lock(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj, 0);
00388                 rc1 = dt_record_write(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj,
00389                                       &info->fti_buf, &info->fti_off, th);
00390                 dt_write_unlock(env, oseq->os_lastid_obj);
00391                 if (rc1 != 0)
00392                         CERROR("%s: fail to reset the LAST_ID for seq ("LPX64
00393                                ") from "LPU64" to "LPU64"\n", ofd_name(ofd),
00394                                ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi), id + nr - 1,
00395                                ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
00396         }
00397 
00398 trans_stop:
00399         ofd_trans_stop(env, ofd, th, rc);
00400 out:
00401         for (i = 0; i < nr_saved; i++) {
00402                 fo = batch[i];
00403                 if (fo) {
00404                         ofd_write_unlock(env, fo);
00405                         ofd_object_put(env, fo);
00406                 }
00407         }
00408         OBD_FREE(batch, nr_saved * sizeof(struct ofd_object *));
00409 
00410         CDEBUG((objects == 0 && rc == 0) ? D_ERROR : D_OTHER,
00411                "created %d/%d objects: %d\n", objects, nr_saved, rc);
00412 
00413         LASSERT(ergo(objects == 0, rc < 0));
00414         RETURN(objects > 0 ? objects : rc);
00415 }
00416 
00434 int ofd_attr_handle_ugid(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo,
00435                          struct lu_attr *la, int is_setattr)
00436 {
00437         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00438         struct lu_attr          *ln = &info->fti_attr2;
00439         __u32                    mask = 0;
00440         int                      rc;
00441 
00442         ENTRY;
00443 
00444         if (!(la->la_valid & LA_UID) && !(la->la_valid & LA_GID))
00445                 RETURN(0);
00446 
00447         rc = dt_attr_get(env, ofd_object_child(fo), ln);
00448         if (rc != 0)
00449                 RETURN(rc);
00450 
00451         LASSERT(ln->la_valid & LA_MODE);
00452 
00453         if (!is_setattr) {
00454                 if (!(ln->la_mode & S_ISUID))
00455                         la->la_valid &= ~LA_UID;
00456                 if (!(ln->la_mode & S_ISGID))
00457                         la->la_valid &= ~LA_GID;
00458         }
00459 
00460         if ((la->la_valid & LA_UID) && (ln->la_mode & S_ISUID))
00461                 mask |= S_ISUID;
00462         if ((la->la_valid & LA_GID) && (ln->la_mode & S_ISGID))
00463                 mask |= S_ISGID;
00464         if (mask != 0) {
00465                 if (!(la->la_valid & LA_MODE) || !is_setattr) {
00466                         la->la_mode = ln->la_mode;
00467                         la->la_valid |= LA_MODE;
00468                 }
00469                 la->la_mode &= ~mask;
00470         }
00471 
00472         RETURN(0);
00473 }
00474 
00491 int ofd_attr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo,
00492                  struct lu_attr *la, struct filter_fid *ff)
00493 {
00494         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00495         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_obj2dev(fo);
00496         struct thandle          *th;
00497         struct ofd_mod_data     *fmd;
00498         int                      ff_needed = 0;
00499         int                      rc;
00500         ENTRY;
00501 
00502         ofd_write_lock(env, fo);
00503         if (!ofd_object_exists(fo))
00504                 GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOENT);
00505 
00506         if (la->la_valid & (LA_ATIME | LA_MTIME | LA_CTIME)) {
00507                 fmd = ofd_fmd_get(info->fti_exp, &fo->ofo_header.loh_fid);
00508                 if (fmd && fmd->fmd_mactime_xid < info->fti_xid)
00509                         fmd->fmd_mactime_xid = info->fti_xid;
00510                 ofd_fmd_put(info->fti_exp, fmd);
00511         }
00512 
00513         /* VBR: version recovery check */
00514         rc = ofd_version_get_check(info, fo);
00515         if (rc)
00516                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00517 
00518         rc = ofd_attr_handle_ugid(env, fo, la, 1 /* is_setattr */);
00519         if (rc != 0)
00520                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00521 
00522         if (ff != NULL) {
00523                 rc = ofd_object_ff_load(env, fo);
00524                 if (rc == -ENODATA)
00525                         ff_needed = 1;
00526                 else if (rc < 0)
00527                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
00528         }
00529 
00530         th = ofd_trans_create(env, ofd);
00531         if (IS_ERR(th))
00532                 GOTO(unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00533 
00534         rc = dt_declare_attr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo), la, th);
00535         if (rc)
00536                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00537 
00538         if (ff_needed) {
00539                 info->fti_buf.lb_buf = ff;
00540                 info->fti_buf.lb_len = sizeof(*ff);
00541                 rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo),
00542                                           &info->fti_buf, XATTR_NAME_FID, 0,
00543                                           th);
00544                 if (rc)
00545                         GOTO(stop, rc);
00546         }
00547 
00548         rc = ofd_trans_start(env, ofd, la->la_valid & LA_SIZE ? fo : NULL, th);
00549         if (rc)
00550                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00551 
00552         rc = dt_attr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo), la, th);
00553         if (rc)
00554                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00555 
00556         if (ff_needed) {
00557                 rc = dt_xattr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo), &info->fti_buf,
00558                                   XATTR_NAME_FID, 0, th);
00559                 if (rc == 0) {
00560                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_seq = le64_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_seq);
00561                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_oid = le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_oid);
00562                         /* Currently, the filter_fid::ff_parent::f_ver is not
00563                          * the real parent MDT-object's FID::f_ver, instead it
00564                          * is the OST-object index in its parent MDT-object's
00565                          * layout EA. */
00566                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_stripe_idx =
00567                                         le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_stripe_idx);
00568                 }
00569         }
00570 
00571         GOTO(stop, rc);
00572 
00573 stop:
00574         ofd_trans_stop(env, ofd, th, rc);
00575 unlock:
00576         ofd_write_unlock(env, fo);
00577 
00578         return rc;
00579 }
00580 
00600 int ofd_object_punch(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo,
00601                      __u64 start, __u64 end, struct lu_attr *la,
00602                      struct filter_fid *ff, struct obdo *oa)
00603 {
00604         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00605         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_obj2dev(fo);
00606         struct ofd_mod_data     *fmd;
00607         struct dt_object        *dob = ofd_object_child(fo);
00608         struct thandle          *th;
00609         int                      ff_needed = 0;
00610         int                      rc;
00611 
00612         ENTRY;
00613 
00614         /* we support truncate, not punch yet */
00615         LASSERT(end == OBD_OBJECT_EOF);
00616 
00617         ofd_write_lock(env, fo);
00618         fmd = ofd_fmd_get(info->fti_exp, &fo->ofo_header.loh_fid);
00619         if (fmd && fmd->fmd_mactime_xid < info->fti_xid)
00620                 fmd->fmd_mactime_xid = info->fti_xid;
00621         ofd_fmd_put(info->fti_exp, fmd);
00622 
00623         if (!ofd_object_exists(fo))
00624                 GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOENT);
00625 
00626         if (ofd->ofd_lfsck_verify_pfid && oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID) {
00627                 rc = ofd_verify_ff(env, fo, oa);
00628                 if (rc != 0)
00629                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
00630         }
00631 
00632         /* VBR: version recovery check */
00633         rc = ofd_version_get_check(info, fo);
00634         if (rc)
00635                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00636 
00637         rc = ofd_attr_handle_ugid(env, fo, la, 0 /* !is_setattr */);
00638         if (rc != 0)
00639                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00640 
00641         if (ff != NULL) {
00642                 rc = ofd_object_ff_load(env, fo);
00643                 if (rc == -ENODATA)
00644                         ff_needed = 1;
00645                 else if (rc < 0)
00646                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
00647         }
00648 
00649         th = ofd_trans_create(env, ofd);
00650         if (IS_ERR(th))
00651                 GOTO(unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00652 
00653         rc = dt_declare_attr_set(env, dob, la, th);
00654         if (rc)
00655                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00656 
00657         rc = dt_declare_punch(env, dob, start, OBD_OBJECT_EOF, th);
00658         if (rc)
00659                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00660 
00661         if (ff_needed) {
00662                 info->fti_buf.lb_buf = ff;
00663                 info->fti_buf.lb_len = sizeof(*ff);
00664                 rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo),
00665                                           &info->fti_buf, XATTR_NAME_FID, 0,
00666                                           th);
00667                 if (rc)
00668                         GOTO(stop, rc);
00669         }
00670 
00671         rc = ofd_trans_start(env, ofd, fo, th);
00672         if (rc)
00673                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00674 
00675         rc = dt_punch(env, dob, start, OBD_OBJECT_EOF, th);
00676         if (rc)
00677                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00678 
00679         rc = dt_attr_set(env, dob, la, th);
00680         if (rc)
00681                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00682 
00683         if (ff_needed) {
00684                 rc = dt_xattr_set(env, ofd_object_child(fo), &info->fti_buf,
00685                                   XATTR_NAME_FID, 0, th);
00686                 if (rc == 0) {
00687                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_seq = le64_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_seq);
00688                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_oid = le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_oid);
00689                         /* Currently, the filter_fid::ff_parent::f_ver is not
00690                          * the real parent MDT-object's FID::f_ver, instead it
00691                          * is the OST-object index in its parent MDT-object's
00692                          * layout EA. */
00693                         fo->ofo_pfid.f_stripe_idx =
00694                                         le32_to_cpu(ff->ff_parent.f_stripe_idx);
00695                 }
00696         }
00697 
00698         GOTO(stop, rc);
00699 
00700 stop:
00701         ofd_trans_stop(env, ofd, th, rc);
00702 unlock:
00703         ofd_write_unlock(env, fo);
00704 
00705         return rc;
00706 }
00707 
00722 int ofd_object_destroy(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo,
00723                        int orphan)
00724 {
00725         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_obj2dev(fo);
00726         struct thandle          *th;
00727         int                      rc = 0;
00728 
00729         ENTRY;
00730 
00731         ofd_write_lock(env, fo);
00732         if (!ofd_object_exists(fo))
00733                 GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOENT);
00734 
00735         th = ofd_trans_create(env, ofd);
00736         if (IS_ERR(th))
00737                 GOTO(unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00738 
00739         rc = dt_declare_ref_del(env, ofd_object_child(fo), th);
00740         if (rc < 0)
00741                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00742 
00743         rc = dt_declare_destroy(env, ofd_object_child(fo), th);
00744         if (rc < 0)
00745                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00746 
00747         if (orphan)
00748                 rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00749         else
00750                 rc = ofd_trans_start(env, ofd, NULL, th);
00751         if (rc)
00752                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00753 
00754         ofd_fmd_drop(ofd_info(env)->fti_exp, &fo->ofo_header.loh_fid);
00755 
00756         dt_ref_del(env, ofd_object_child(fo), th);
00757         dt_destroy(env, ofd_object_child(fo), th);
00758 stop:
00759         ofd_trans_stop(env, ofd, th, rc);
00760 unlock:
00761         ofd_write_unlock(env, fo);
00762         RETURN(rc);
00763 }
00764 
00778 int ofd_attr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_object *fo,
00779                  struct lu_attr *la)
00780 {
00781         int rc = 0;
00782 
00783         ENTRY;
00784 
00785         if (ofd_object_exists(fo)) {
00786                 rc = dt_attr_get(env, ofd_object_child(fo), la);
00787         } else {
00788                 rc = -ENOENT;
00789         }
00790         RETURN(rc);
00791 }
